TopicTitle: New - Post Patch - Two Instances of KSP2 Up at the Same Time

Articles.Content:
This was weird.  Had a crash related to moving the 'Wing Adjustment' popup.  The top of the window went up under the Vehicle Name bar and I could not grab the window to move it, close it or ESC out of it.  (We really need ESC to be able to close windows!)

Anyway - the game froze after that and I thought I'd closed the crashed game (had to alt tab, then close on toolbar).

Restarted the game - only to discover that the 'closed' window had not closed; ended up with two simultaneous instances of KSP2 open at the same time.
